casebody.data:
L.R., Individually and on Behalf of J.R., a Minor, Plaintiffs,
v.
CAMDEN CITY PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT and John C. Oberg in His Official Capacity as Interim School Business Administrator and Board Secretary, Defendants. L.R., Individually and on Behalf of J.R., a Minor, Plaintiffs,
v.
Parsippany-Troy Hills Township Public School District and David F. Corso in His Official Capacity as Records Custodian of the Parsippany-Troy Hills Township Public School District, Defendants. The Innisfree Foundation, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Hillsborough Township Board of Education and Aiman Mahmoud, Records Custodian, Defendants. The Innisfree Foundation, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Cherry Hill Board of Education and James Devereaux, Records Custodian, Defendants. M-965 September Term 2017
080333 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 18, 2018

CORRECTED ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the Education Law Center and Council of Parent Attorneys and Advocates for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted, limited solely to the filing of the brief that accompanied the motion. The parties may serve and file briefs in response on or before May 18, 2018.
